description:
The Straw Hats are surrounded, outnumbered, blasted with tear gas. Taking a pretty, young doctor hostage may be their only hope for surviving long enough for a Merry reunion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Breaking Through the Siege! The Going Merry Is Recovered!
Houi Mou Toppa! Dakkan Going Merry Gou
Il faut forcer le barrage ! Le Vogue Merry est retrouvé
Прорываясь сквозь вражеские ряды! Спасение Гоинг Мерри
ฝ่าวงล้อมออกไป!ศึกชิงเรือโกอิ้งแมรี่
包囲網突破! 奪還ゴーイングメリー号
